Title: Repeals a provision of the social services law excluding schools for children under three
Summary: Repeals a provision excluding kindergartens, pre-kindergartens, or nursery schools for children three years of age or older, or after-school programs for children operated by a public school district or by a private school or academy which is providing elementary or secondary education or both from the definition of child day care.
LawCode: Rpld §390 sub 1 ¶(a) sub¶ (ii) cl (D), Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal clause (D) of subparagraph (ii) of paragraph (a) of subdivision 1 of section 390 of the social services law relating to the definition of a child day care
